Race.SpecificTitle: Constable(s) -- Justice of the Peace Ward 8
SubRd.Dist#2 of Rd.Dist#2 -- 6.50 Mills - Police Jury - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 2 of Road District No. 2 Proposition
 (Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 6.50 mills property tax renewal for constructing, maintaining and keeping in repair parish roads in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 2 of Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six and fifty hundredths (6.50) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $14,280) on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and keeping in repair parish roads in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: SubRd.Dist#5 of Rd.Dist#2 -- 6 Mills - Police Jury - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 5 of Road District No. 2 Proposition
 (Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 6 mills property tax renewal for constructing, maintaining and keeping in repair parish roads in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 5 of Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six (6) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $104,910) on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and keeping in repair parish roads in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 3 -- 5.5 Mills - Police Jury - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 3 Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 5.5 mills property tax renewal for constructing, maintaining
and keeping in repair parish roads in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 3 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and five-tenths (5.5) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $48,598) on all the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and keeping in repair parish roads in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Pecan Island FPD No. 16 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Pecan Island Fire Protection District No.16 Proposition

Summary:  10 year, 10 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Pecan Island Fire Protection District No. 16 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $210,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Isle Marrone GDD No. 1 -- 32.59 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Isle Marrone Gravity Drainage District No. 1 Proposition

Summary:  10 year, 32.59 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, maintaining and/or operating gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Isle Marrone Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a thirty two and fifty-nine hundredths (32.59) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $184,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and/or operating gravity drainage works within and for the District, said Tax to be in lieu of a similar tax currently being levied at nine and sixty-nine hundredths (9.69) mills authorized to be levied through the year 2009?
